RumorFact.Text: The Nomai planed to do something to this former neutron star to turn it into a suitable sun for its formerly icy planet.

Chert radioed me about a strange star that suddenly appeared in an otherwise empty patch of space 2,700 lightyears away. It has a strange luminosity profile - the star itself is nearly dead in the visible range, though the corona could belong to a regular star. Riebeck thinks its sudden appearance may be connected to the Nomai.

ExploreFact.Text: I found these strange structures positioned above the poles of the star.

RumorFact.Text: Nissi, the Nomai engineer, said that "the core" of the structure they built can be accessed by flying through either of these aperatures.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Dyson sphere at the core of this solar amplification structure! This is the end of the mod, thanks for playing!
